title: Supply and Demand Zones
description: Deep dive into supply and demand zones - the most advanced level of understanding price action. Learn how institutional traders use these zones.
content:
In this lesson, you'll learn:

• The difference between static levels and dynamic zones
• How to identify accumulation and distribution zones
• How to use supply and demand in confluence with other tools
• Real trading examples from major markets

quiz.question: What is a supply zone?
options: Where sellers are concentrated and selling pressure emerges
quiz.explanation: A supply zone is an area where sellers are concentrated and selling pressure emerges. Prices typically struggle to break above these zones.
